column5: MNR conservation officers in the NW region are volunteering to have their heads shaved in support of cancer research. If you want to support your favorite CO here's the link http://convio.cancer.ca/site/TR/Cops...al&fr_id=24222 Don't have a favorite and you've contributed through fines and tickets? Contribute anyways! Click on Team MNR to see a list of officers.
